task.summary: Segment Builder class added, and some refactoring work
BoardView update. It can draw pirates.
Minor bugs fixed, card list view implemented and some coloring work done. From now on, it is playable (Only single player features are working.)
Setup view implemented. From now on users can change the player count, segment count and possible symbols from user interface
